title: box.sdf example: missing character at end

content.raw:
In the simple "Create a Model" tutorial introducing SDF, the box.sdf example cuts off before the final character in the file (which is a bracket that closes an xml tag. Interestingly, the included [file](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/default/build_model/files/box.sdf includes) does show the correct xml, but it doesn't display correctly in my browser (Chrome on Ubuntu 12.04). 

Pedantic, but it could be a headache for an unobservant tutorial follower.
content.html:
In the simple "Create a Model" tutorial introducing SDF, the box.sdf example cuts off before the final character in the file (which is a bracket that closes an xml tag. Interestingly, the included file does show the correct xml, but it doesn't display correctly in my browser (Chrome on Ubuntu 12.04).

Pedantic, but it could be a headache for an unobservant tutorial follower.
